ingredients.ingredient: 1 (17.25 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed

cookingTips: Thaw puff pastry in the refrigerator overnight or on the counter for 30-40 minutes before using
Bake at 400°F for 12-15 minutes until puffed and golden brown
Dust with powdered sugar while still warm for the best appearance and coating
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how to handle puff pastry and why proper thawing is essential for flaky results.
